This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: Left of Orions belt flashing still light, two wittneses, red blue white flash every 10 min or so, hazy sky
divs: sighting detailsflashing statanary light. red then blue almost looked like a square and the two white flashes round. just to the left of orions belt newmarket nh 2\23\12 815 pm to 9 15 pm, hazy sky. tought the blue was the sun reflection off a satalite. i would guess its a balloon. right? never seen any thing quite like it. we sit in the hot tub often and just look up. after about a hour i would say it was slowley moving left to right.. girl friend saw it too. thanks brian
